channel.title: CVE Feed for Dahua -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dahua -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39944|2024-07-31T19:10:56.884Z -- dahua -- ipc-hx8xxx%20and%20nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.Attackers can send carefully crafted data packets to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-39950|2024-07-31T19:12:46.084Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx%20and%20ipc-hx8xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products. Attackers can send carefully crafted data packets to the interface with vulnerabilities to initiate device initialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-39945|2024-07-31T14:01:32.146Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products. After obtaining the administrator's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-39947|2024-07-31T03:25:09.750Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.After obtaining the ordinary user's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.
